participant_1.background:
I like to listen to music about animals when I walk my dog.
I would like to learn how to train my dogs to behave better.
I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years.
I love Asian food, especially spicy Thai food.
i love to cut down trees.

participant_2.background:
I realized that losing my mind was the first step to winning.
I am dedicated to my interests and find creative ways to learn more about them.
I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day.
I try to eat a balanced diet and exercise regularly, but sometimes I indulge in my favorite pepperoni pizza.
I would brag about writing poetry about the woods near my house where I used to play as a child.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
I'm retired now but I was an educator for many years.
What did you teach?
I taught math and science.
My favorite subject in school was math!
Mine too! I love numbers!
Do you have any hobbies?
I love to cook, especially Asian food. I love spicy Thai food!
I love Asian food too! I love the flavors!
I also love to read poetry, especially about nature.
That's beautiful! I love to write poetry!
What's your favorite kind of poetry to write?
I love to write about the woods near my house where I used to play as a child.
That sounds beautiful!
Thanks! I also love to listen to music about animals when I walk my dog.
That sounds like a great way to spend time with your dog!
It is! My dog loves to go on walks.
I'm glad you're enjoying your retirement!
I am too
